General.Name: Chi Hua Fitness Co Ltd
General.Description: Chi Hua Fitness Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells fitness equipment parts in worldwide. The company provides hybrid generator brakes, medical application load units, field coil eddy current brakes, and PM brakes; lower control boards; TFT, LCD, and LED consoles; BLDC drivers, and brushless and brush DC motors; cables; and accessories, which include gear motors and heart rate sensor boards. It also offers special products, including motor utility strength trainer, bicycle trainer, fuel pump, and LED light bar products. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.231, Dexing Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan
